nodes.text: Mellaw Doowon was a male Ithorian and ommni box player in a band called the Dewback Ramblers.
After the Battle of Yavin, Mellaw Doowon and the Dewback Ramblers operated out of the Lucky Star cantina in Mos Entha, on the planet Tatooine.

Circa 1 ABY, Mellaw Doowon made some bad jokes to Imperial authorities outside of Mos Entha. The band leader Blerx Tango tasked a spacer to find Mellaw, and bring him back safely. The spacer agreed, but was forced to kill a stormtrooper that would not let Mellaw be escorted.
Mellaw Doowon was a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. In the game, players doing a mission for Blerx Tango had to rescue Mellaw.
